location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Cowper, Commissary General at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Major William Cowper, Commissary General at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire requesting a consignment of sulphur from Bushire to the Bengal Government.In attachment, letter sent on 22 December 1813 by Colonel Thomas Matthias Weguelin, Commissary General at Fort William, to Major William Cowper, regarding the excellent quality of the sulphur received from Bushire and its value.
